it.unimi.di.law.warc.filters

Class ContentTypeStartsWith

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unimi.di.law.warc.filters.AbstractFilter<HttpResponse>
      • it.unimi.di.law.warc.filters.ContentTypeStartsWith
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.common.base.Predicate<HttpResponse>, Filter<HttpResponse>, FlyweightPrototype<Filter<HttpResponse>>

    public class ContentTypeStartsWith
extends AbstractFilter<HttpResponse>
    A filter accepting only fetched response whose content type starts with a given string.

    Typical usage: ContentTypeStartsWith(text/),

        Creates a filter that only accepts URLs whose content type starts with a given prefix.

    • Method Detail

      • apply

        public boolean apply(HttpResponse x)
        Apply the filter to a HttpResponse
        Parameters:
        x - the HttpResponse to be filtered
        Returns:
        true if the first header of the given HttpResponse is not null and starts with the prefix

        Returns:
